in
conclusion so I have here two

Expressions before but if you've ever

they're very very formal and so they

I've told you first um dogs are very

I've talked a little bit about how cute

dogs are great pets okay um I might also

excellent

it's pretty interesting because nutshell
I don't know the history of it but in a

in

line the bottom line is dogs make
excellent
pets uh if I've given a lot of reasons
you know dogs are clean they're cute
they're smart for these reasons dogs
make excellent pets and finally um all
